Receive notification of the start of an element.

For each new element, add the element's name to the _currentKey list.

public void endElement(java.lang.String s,
                       java.lang.String s1,
                       java.lang.String s2)
                throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
Receive notification of the end of an element.

Every time an element ends, trim off the last element in the _currentKey list.
